name: [WEB Component] Product card should have expected data

steps.name: Check product card [Winter Top] has title: Winter Top
Check [Product Title has text: Winter Top]
Check product card [Winter Top] has price: PriceDTO(currency=<Currency.RS: 'Rs'>, amount=Decimal('600'))
Check [product carousel component] contains expected products: ('Winter Top', 'Summer White Top', 'Blue Top', 'Men Tshirt')
steps.statusMessage: AssertionError: Product carousel expected products not found: ['Blue Top', 'Men Tshirt']

steps.name: Get test video from Selenoid by video id = [test_product_card_has_expected_data]
Remove current test users from backend
Remove users from backend after all tests
